about_the_game:
The game is now available as “HORGIHUGH,” a shooting game that has been well received for its package illustrations by KOU, an illustrator who has worked on the “Shanti” series and other games, and for its serious theme and authentic level design, despite its cute retro dot-picture appearance.

The game is a 2D side-scrolling shooter, with a reinforcement element using pieces of cubes obtained in the game,

and battles with boss enemies that have various means of attack.

The game is a 2D side-scrolling shooter.

Various additions and adjustments have been made to “HORGIHUGH.

HORGIHUGH with FRIENDS”.
